Montanism revived by Philip Hermon, a Quaker cobler, and chief speaker at the Savoy meeting; confuted with some of his antichristian principles and prophecies: to which is added some reasons for my leaving the Quakers. By Clement Joynes. Joynes, Clement.
[2], 14, [2] p.
printed for the author, London : 1700.
With a final advertisement leaf. Reproduction of the original in the Friends House Library, London.
=======
